name: GOD HANDS
description:
GOD HANDS

VR and Desktop players must work together to complete challenging puzzles to complete levels!

VR:

As a VR player you are a large floating entity, that has the ability to grab far away objects within the environment. You must stack blocks and ramps in order to create a path to the end of the level for your smaller desktop-using partner, whilst dodging incoming projectiles from turrets.

DESKTOP:

As the Desktop player, your objective is to navigate the platforms placed by the VR player to reach the end of each level marked by a button terminal. You have the ability to shoot your gun to block incoming projectiles that might hit your VR counterpart, as well as combat AI driven enemies that will try to stop you.  

Combat:

Most levels will have Red colored enemies that will only target the Desktop player once the player enters their general area, marked by a transparent blue shield encompassing their area.
